br.com.caelum.vraptor.serialization

Interface NoRootSerialization

  • All Superinterfaces:
    View
    All Known Subinterfaces:
    JSONSerialization, Serialization, XMLSerialization
    All Known Implementing Classes:
    GsonJSONSerialization, HTMLSerialization, RestfulSerialization, RestfulSerializationJSON, XStreamJSONSerialization, XStreamXMLSerialization

    public interface NoRootSerialization
extends View
    Creates a serializer of a given format with out ROOT alias.
    Version:
    3.1.2
    Author:
    Tomaz Lavieri
